title: Audit AI Model Governance
description: An IT auditor reviews the governance process for developing and deploying artificial intelligence (AI) models.

tasks.description: Review the company's AI ethics policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms that a policy exists to guide the ethical development of AI.

tasks.description: For a new AI model used for credit scoring, review the documentation to see how the model was tested for bias against protected groups.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds that the documentation for bias testing is weak and lacks statistical rigor.

tasks.description: Verify that there is a process for monitoring the AI model's performance in production to detect drift or degradation over time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms that a model monitoring process is in place.
